title: Never A Slave
description: Book 7 in the series Trek Mi Q'anLord Julian Jameson went into the woods to relax — to beat his chest and celebrate his masculinity in an environment free of women. In the blink of an eye he was on Galis, an alien planet where women rule. Gorgeous women with insatiable libidos. Naked and in chains, Julian is furious and humiliated—a condition that does not improve when he is auctioned off as a sex slave to Klykka Gy'at Li, High Mystik.But Julian is no woman's slave. Not now. Not ever.
author: Jaid Black
